product_name: Laura MercierReal Flawless Weightless Perfecting Waterproof Foundation
summary: SummaryLaura Mercier's weightless, long-wearing Real Flawless Weightless Perfecting Foundation blurs the line between makeup and skin with medium buildable coverage and 12 hours of waterproof and fade-proof wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsBlurs the look of imperfections, pores & fine linesImproves skin tone & textureLong-wearing for 12 hoursControls oil immediatelyImproves skin texture in 6 weeksImproves hydration for 24 hoursHumidity, sweat & waterproofSuitable for all skin types, including sensitive skinNon-comedogenic & Dermatologist testedFeaturesRe-define perfecting coverage with this multifunctional foundation to reveal a healthier-looking complexionPerfecting Color Technology lifts sallowness & dullness for cake-free, color-true wearAuto-Balancing Technology instantly hydrates for smoother skin & helps reduce shine throughout the day94% of users said it feels comfortable on skin*90% of users said it blends seamlessly into skin & stays comfortable throughout the day*87% of users said complexion looks healthier*86% of users said it creates a more even looking complexion*Glass bottle is sustainable & recyclable*Based on a consumer test of 63 participantsItem 2608627How To UseDispense one to two pumps onto the back of your hand. Using a dense buffing foundation brush, press the flat end of the bristles into the product and tap on back of hand to disperse the product evenly into the bristles. Apply the foundation onto clean skin in sweeping motions to blend onto the skin. Only apply where needed to even skin's tone. Use the tapered end or smaller brush to blend in smaller areas of the face, such as, around the corners of the nose.For optimal wear, this foundation works best with silicone-free primers, like any of the Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Primers. After your finished look, set with your preferred Laura Mercier setting powder for all day wear (both sold separately).IngredientsIsododecane, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Hydrogenated Didecene, Silica, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Dicalcium Phosphate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cellulose, Lauryl Pca, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Aqua/Water/Eau, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense one to two pumps onto the back of your hand. Using a dense buffing foundation brush, press the flat end of the bristles into the product and tap on back of hand to disperse the product evenly into the bristles. Apply the foundation onto clean skin in sweeping motions to blend onto the skin. Only apply where needed to even skin's tone. Use the tapered end or smaller brush to blend in smaller areas of the face, such as, around the corners of the nose.For optimal wear, this foundation works best with silicone-free primers, like any of the Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Primers. After your finished look, set with your preferred Laura Mercier setting powder for all day wear (both sold separately).
ingredients: Butylene Glycol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491

reviews.headline: Wasn't for me
reviews.comments: I am glad this was on the 21 days of beauty so I didn't pay full price. I have been buying quite a few different foundations (other than my Estee Lauder) to see what my options are. Sadly this was was extremely oily, heavy, and I couldn't get good coverage from it. Also, I did the "find your shade", and it wasn't a good match at all. My face feels gross, dirty and oily. Even after my setting powder.

reviews.headline: A complete miss for me.
reviews.comments: This is the first foundation in the last decade I've bought that I just didn't like at all. I was so excited this was on the 21 Days Of Beauty. I bought it in two shades. Both oxidized fairly quickly. I tried this foundation five days in a row now all with different skincare prep and different primers hoping to love it. All five times this foundation wore me I did not wear the foundation. My skin looked better without it. Unfortunately it just wasn't for me and I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love it 3rd purchase

reviews.headline: It's the most incredible foundation I've ever tried,
reviews.comments: It's the most incredible foundation I've ever tried, it's spectacular, it's light but with medium buildable coverage, it's the best.

reviews.headline: Just perfect
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the amazing coverage of this foundation and love how it feels on my skin without it feeling like a mask . It covers my redness and makes my skin look flawless without looking like a mask or too heavy on the skin .

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Love this product!! My skin feels supple and glowy when applied. Color match is perfect.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Not enough coverage

reviews.headline: impressive
reviews.comments: I had my son at 40. I'll be 46 next month.  Yesterday I was out with him bare faced and an elderly man called me his grandma. no big deal. It's nothing new. When I got home my package from ulta was here,so I got myself ready with this foundation.  We went to the hospital to see my mom. My 22 year old daughter was there as well. The nurse thought she was my sister.  I mentioned that I had my son at 40 and she was shocked. She said she would've guessed 27 at the max. I was so flattered! The only thing I can think is that The foundation made me look that good. that was the only new item on me. it doesn't look like a mask. blends perfectly.  I doubt I will ever switch to a different foundation

reviews.headline: Will not buy again
reviews.comments: Beautiful foundation however my skin is super sensitive and reacted to this foundation.

reviews.headline: Flawless skin
reviews.comments: This is my go to for a flawless complexion! When I want the airbrushed, perfectly even skin look, and longevity for the day, through humidity, sweat, etc, this is what I choose. For a waterproof formula that is long wearing, I find this foundation to be extremely comfortable. I also appreciate that this is fragrance free and the blurring action makes my skin look so incredibly smooth.

reviews.headline: Best foundation I have ever tried!
reviews.comments: Holy grail! Better than Armani!!

reviews.headline: No thanks
reviews.comments: dry feeling, specifically asked for hydrating...gets chalky even after using primer and then a set spray

reviews.headline: My favorite makeup of all time
reviews.comments: This makeup matches me perfectly. It feels like no other makeup I've ever used. It feels like skincare.

reviews.headline: This foundation is easy to apply!
reviews.comments: This is so easy and stays on all day with no touch ups! The color match was perfect! You won't even need a finishing powder but of course I use the blur powder from Laura Mercier. It is waterproof and isn't coming off until you take it off. It is very weightless. Doesn't feel like you have any makeup on.

reviews.headline: New formula is awful!!
reviews.comments: I loved the Oil Free silk cr√®me photo foundation. Not sure why it was changed or discontinued. But this new stuff is awful. Not even close to the quality I have come to love from LM. The new formula dries my face out and does not blend well. I thew away the bottle after 2 uses and went back to IT.

reviews.headline: Gorgeous glow
reviews.comments:
As someone with skin picking disorder and ridiculously sensitive skin, finding a foundation that is kind to my skin, while not enhancing texture is next to impossible. I'm on the hunt for my wedding foundation, and I think I have found the winner. This foundation really is flawless, like the name suggests. I have some lines on my forehead and scabs everywhere most of the time. This foundation never sinks into my forehad lines or causes my scabs to flake or stand out. It conceals magnificently. I prime/prep with my normal skin care routine. After foundation, I set with the new Fenty setting spray and sometimes add on the saie translucent loose setting powder to my lines. This dream combination lasts all day and is almost completely transfer proof. 

I am ghostly pale and very cool toned. My only frustratuon is that the lightest shade (1C1) goes on as the PERFECT shade, then dries down darker and more warm. Laura Mercier, PLEASE expand your shade range or look into the dry down,  because this formulation is unmatched!

reviews.headline: Soft & weightless as described
reviews.comments: Feels so light a fresh feeling on my face

reviews.headline: Thrilled and pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: I usually wear higher end foundation with a heftier price tag, but this is a dream. So blendable, medium coverage, and so skin like. Pair it with the brands luminescent finishing powder and feel like a supermodel!

reviews.headline: Not for me!
reviews.comments: Being that there were mixed reviews, decided to give a try for myself. However, i did have high expectations but unfortunately I ended up being disappointed. This foundation, in my opinion, is for normal, pore less skin.  If you have texture and large pores, this will definitely enhances those features.

reviews.headline: Best Foundation
reviews.comments: I am a 48 year old with combination skin. This foundation goes on smooth and hides pores without looking cakey. A little goes a long way. I use one pump, sometimes a half pump for my entire face and neck. It feels extremely light and lasts all day. I recommend.

media.headline: Great foundation should buy.
media.caption: Great foundation I got today from Bzzagent.

faceoff_positive.comments: After receiving this for free via Bzzagent's Laura Mercier Real Flawless Weightless Perfecting Foundation sampling campaign, I started seeing the viral TikTok videos with countless makeup gurus singing this foundation's praises. I knew it was a solid brand - my college roommate used a lot of Laura Mercier skincare and makeup products. It's one of those brands where it's worth every penny - you get quality products that can't be substituted. Dupes were about as close as I could get to Laura Mercier back in my broke college days, but now that I'm older & can (sometimes) afford to splurge on good products, I choose Laura Mercier frequently because it's so worth the money. I could buy dupes or cheaper versions, but why waste the money? It always leads to disappointment (it's true - you pay for what you get), and I end up tossing them in the bin. I had a feeling when the videos of influencers & makeup enthusiasts raving about this foundation emerged that it would be no exception. So I tried it out, and just as I suspected - this foundation is nothing short of amazing! The buildable coverage is ideal for my aging skin. I have major dry skin at times so I use a couple of drops of facial oil to prevent it from going on to dry - works like a charm! If you've seen the viral videos about this foundation, you've probably seen everyone also hyping up a specific makeup brush. I haven't tried it yet, but I plan on ordering one because I HAVE to try it with this foundation. As for the foundation, yes -- it's pricey, but I look at is as a necessary tool for my makeup bag... an investment into my beauty goals. It creates the best "canvas" for my makeup. It flawlessly conceals the cracks, cresses and discoloration (aka wrinkles, fine lines and redness) to create a clear, smooth, uniform canvas that I can create gorgeous makeup looks on. I feel confident thanks to it's staying power - it lasts all day/I don't have to reapply. Seriously, this foundation is everything. Believe the hype!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing Buildable Coverage - Believe the hype! üòç

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received this from BzzAgent and am impressed with how well this foundation looks and applies. Very smooth and doesn't emphasize texture. I have combination skin with an oily T-zone and cheeks and found this controls it for a few hours. I will have to blot after about 4-5 hours which isn't bad for me. It takes about 3-4 pumps for my entire face, but the amount of product dispensed per pump is very slight. 4 pumps probably dispenses what would be about 1 pump of product when compared to other foundation pumps. It oxidizes to be about a shade darker.   

   I have 3 negatives though. 
   1. It transfers easily. Even with primer and setting spray. 

   2. I feel like this causes acne. I get a bump or two on my cheek and forehead (my problem areas) almost every time I apply it. I don't have the best skin and go through periods of time where I get random bouts of it, but I have it under control for the most part. I've only used it about 6 times and have gotten acne 4 of the times. It could be the product or it could be a fluke.  

   3. The shade selection isn't the best. Like most brands, the selection for the lighter shades is very plentiful, thorough and consistent. The tanner/darker shades? Not so much. Thorough meaning not having large jumps in between colors. Like usual, shades were pretty thorough right up to what would be my shade. Then completely skipped my shade to go to something darker. Consistent meaning the shades go in order and make sense. Colors usually go from lightest to darkest. With this, once you get to the tanner/darker colors, shades start flip flopping. I selected 2 shades when filling out the BzzAgent survey. 4w1- Suntan and 5n1- Cinnamon. I was sent 5n1 which is too dark. But 4w1 would have been too light. The shade best for me would have been 4n2- Tea, but it wasn't an option and STILL would have been too light. 

I really like how it looks though. I would totally come out of pocket and make 4n2 work if I didn't suspect it of causing acne.
faceoff_negative.headline: A Quality Looking Foundation w/ Issues

variant_names: Real Flawless Weightless Perfecting Waterproof Foundation
